Interrupts.Name: Counter-strike
Interrupts.Trigger: This character or an adjacent ally is hit or miss by a melee attack.
Interrupts.Effects: The attacker is shoved 1 and must save. On a failed save, they take [fray] damage and are dazed.

Actions.Name: Blunderbuss
Actions.AreaEffect: This character fires a heavy sidearm in the area. Foes inside are shoved 1 and take 2 damage.

Actions.Name: Hold the Line!
Actions.Description: This character gains aura 2 until the end of its next turn. This character and any of its allies inside the aura have resistance against melee attacks.
